title: SET_CAM_ROT
content:
0x85973643155D0B070xEE38B3C1// SetCamRot
void SET_CAM_ROT(Cam cam, float rotX, float rotY, float rotZ, int rotationOrder);Parameters:cam: The camera handle to use, in order to change the rotationrotX: Rotation on XrotY: Rotation on YrotZ: Rotation on ZrotationOrder: The order of rotation, see GET_ENTITY_ROTATIONSets the rotation of the camera.Examples:Lua-- We need a valid camera handle for this to work.
local theCamHandle = CreateCam("DEFAULT_SCRIPTED_CAMERA", true)
SetCamRot(theCamHandle, 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0)
codeBlocks:
// SetCamRot
void SET_CAM_ROT(Cam cam, float rotX, float rotY, float rotZ, int rotationOrder);

-- We need a valid camera handle for this to work.
local theCamHandle = CreateCam("DEFAULT_SCRIPTED_CAMERA", true)
SetCamRot(theCamHandle, 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0)
